home.parrafo-info: I am a DevOps Engineer with experience in managing, automating, and networking infrastructures using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform. I specialize in system stability, security, and scalability, as well as advanced network management. I also have a deep interest in cybersecurity and pentesting, allowing me to optimize infrastructures from a security-first perspective. My passion for continuous process improvement and sharing knowledge with the community is a key aspect of my career.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am a DevOps Engineer specializing in automating infrastructures and managing cloud environments. My focus is on ensuring system efficiency, scalability, and security using modern tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform. I also have a strong interest in network management, allowing me to optimize and secure infrastructure from a comprehensive perspective. Passionate about collaborative work, I am always seeking new technologies and methods to improve processes. My deep interest in cybersecurity drives me to implement protection measures at every stage of development and deployment.
